description: meta info used by the GPAW parser, all names are expected to start with gpaw_

metaInfos.description: Magnetic moments projected onto atoms. The sum givs the total magnetic moment
metaInfos.name: gpaw_magnetic_moments

metaInfos.description: Value of the z component of the spin moment operator $S^z$ for the converged calculation with the XC_method.
metaInfos.name: gpaw_spin_Sz

metaInfos.description: Target value of the z component of the spin moment operator $S^z$ for the converged calculation with the XC_method.
metaInfos.name: gpaw_target_spin_Sz
